document_data.name: Malathon
document_data.mainbody: '''Malathon''' was a [[half-orc]] [[cleric]] of [[Bane]] who helped in the attack on [[Shadowdale]].
document_data.Abilities: His [[cleric]] domains were [[Destruction domain|Destruction]] and [[Evil domain|Evil]].
document_data.Possessions: The Dark Doom wore ''+3 [[full plate]]'' that provided him with resistance to [[spell]]s in battle, and wielded an enchanted ''+2 [[morningstar]]''. For additional protection, Malathon carried a ''[[ring of counterspells]]'' and an ''[[amulet of proof against petrification]]''.
document_data.History: During the [[Zhent]] occupation of [[Shadowdale]] in [[Hammer]], [[1375 DR]], High Priest Malathon was charged with rebuilding the temple of Bane in [[Castle Krag]].
